trans-unit.source: Provides type information for an object.
trans-unit.target: Gir informasjon om for et objekt.

trans-unit.source: Use this interface to provide custom type information that is carried along with the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef> objects.
trans-unit.target: Bruk dette grensesnittet for å angi egendefinerte typeinformasjonen som utføres sammen med den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>objekter.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the proxy that represents the specified object type can be cast to the type represented by the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.IRemotingTypeInfo"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer om proxyen som representerer den angitte objekttypen kan endres til typen som representerer den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.IRemotingTypeInfo"> </xref> grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: The current method is called when an attempt is made to cast a proxy generated from a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende metoden kalles når er gjort forsøk på å endre en proxy som er generert fra en <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>

trans-unit.source: This method takes into account the type information carried in the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tar hensyn typeinformasjonen utføres i <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>

trans-unit.source: The object for which to check casting.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if cast will succeed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis endringen vil lykkes; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: Umiddelbar oppkalleren kaller via en referanse til grensesnittet og har ikke tillatelse for infrastruktur.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the fully qualified type name of the server object in a <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det fullstendige navnet på server-objekt i en <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified type name of the server object in a <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fullstendige typenavnet på server-objekt i en <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: Umiddelbar oppkalleren kaller via en referanse til grensesnittet og har ikke tillatelse for infrastruktur.
